website_summaries.verdict: High capacity backpack that’s also capable of taking scuba gear.
pros: Backpack-style bag with padded shoulder pads means you can carry heavier gear more easily, and this large sturdy bag can fit a lot of gear
Comes with a built-in safety whistle
Also makes a good beach or boating bag
cons: Some issues with the side zipper failing

website_summaries.verdict: Small mesh dive bag that has a really good price point, yet is tough enough to carry all of your gear securely.
pros: Includes padded shoulder straps, so you can carry the bag comfortably
Uses a 600D polyester mesh material that's durable, while allowing the wet gear inside to receive a bit of airflow
Includes multiple pockets for storing small items
cons: Dive bag is a little smaller than some others

customer_reviews.title: Extremely large and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a really large diving or snorkeling bag it is perfect for my needs you can fit a very large amount of stuff in here it's it's about 3 to 4 ft tall I wish I would have found this when I first start it snorkeling it would have helped out so much I would definitely recommend this to friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Darkgodess

customer_reviews.title: I returned the product after the 1st dive trip due to problems with both zippers...
customer_reviews.text: Main zipper broke on my first! dive trip carrying my scuba equipment ... since I was on the way to a ferry it was not very amusing to pick up my stuff on the jetty since I was in a hurry not to miss the ferry :-) Until then the bag itself was working well - besides that the inner zipper for the waterproofed pouch was not closing 100% from the beginning -due to misalignment.- and some water went in...Anyway I returned the bag after the trip without problems and was refunded. Conclusion: - Amazon customer service 100% (as usual) - Product quality / usability 0% (disappointing zipper quality, rest of the bag worked well)
customer_reviews.author: Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: We needed to consolidate our snorkel gear, defog, sunscreen , aquapod poles, Sea Life cameras into one bag and still have room for water, towels any misc items like books. This bag allows for all those things. Its larger than I expexcted but thats good obviously. The backpack straps also have a strap that goes across your chest and clasps. Thats handy for better stability and helps balance the weight in your shoulders better, less strain on the lower back. The bags material is nice and thick, you can tell its well made. A great bag for a great price. My only suggestion would be to make it in more colors. Black is my least fav color. 🙂.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 25" long fins. Also holds all my other personal gear (no bcd or reg although i think it would certainly fit. The goggles in their case fit perfectly in the width and depth of the front pocket with some extra room in the height of the pocket. Seems like a quality bag. Smells a little plasticy out of the box, but a quick hose down in the shower instantly gets rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: C0517

customer_reviews.title: Big sturdy bag with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty nice bag though It was bigger than I expected. It can hold 2 sets of fins, 2 snorkels, 2 masks, and 2 towels and still have a little room. It has padded straps as well. Taking it on a cruise with stops in the Caribbean for snorkeling. Only bag need to take when you depart the ship. The attached exterior pouch is a nice size too.
customer_reviews.author: dogette

customer_reviews.title: Extra big, extra stong
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag about 20 times so far. Each time it was packed with two complete sets of scuba gear to include 2 x 3mm wet suits, fins, masks, BC, octo, etc. Total gear weight had to be 60lbs. It has proven durable by either the shoulder straps or the handle. Nice zipper compartment to keep your socks and gloves, or a ziplock with your phone and wallet. The compartment is not water proof. This bag has metal grommets that guides the draw string and those show no signs of rust. The zipper also appears durable. Great value. Extra large, extra strong!
customer_reviews.author: azon Cus

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: Rusted after one use. The metal grommets rusted after first scuba diving trip with it. Trip was only four dives on two, consecutive days. Rust will stain gear, boat deck, and fray the cinch cords. Return via Amazon was easy.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: This is a big bag, but if that's what you need this is a great, cost-effective solution
customer_reviews.text: We needed a bag big enough so I could shlep both my wife's & my dive gear on & off day boats that were going to be out on the ocean for a while. It can hold two sets of fins/masks/wetsuits/hoods/camera etc. comfortably. I've tried doing this with string bags in the past, but they're hard to carry when fully loaded with two sets of gear; this has shoulder straps, making carrying it a snap. It could also work for one person carrying his BC and weights as well. If you need to carry wet gear this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ehkzu

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new boat bag for my scuba gear. This bag is exactly what I needed. So much so that I immediately bought another to replace an existing bag that did not work nearly as well. The mesh is very strong and the vinyl coating ensure it dries quickly. The straps are wide enough to be comfortable and not cut into my shoulders when loaded. The waist are chest straps are a nice touch on those extra long treks to and from the boat dock. If you boat dive this is the bag you should be taking on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Arc

customer_reviews.title: This bag is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: The coated mesh seems to be both durable and flexible...time will tell. Pros: Easily holds all equipment (I only carry mask, fins, snorkel, camera, and computer when traveling), and it can be carried on since there's not much in it. The pouch was good for holding camera and computer with the rest in the main bag. Only Cons: The "dry" pouch inside the main bag didn't actually keep things dry, and the bag is way bigger than I needed, so it's a little awkward to carry. It proved useful though when I used it for overflow for sandals, etc. on my return flight.
customer_reviews.author: John Hackett

customer_reviews.title: zippers are really cheap! broke within a few months of light use!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, please be aware if you are a serious diver and intend to use this bag frequently (more than once a month), that this product is extremely cheaply made. The zipper for the front pocket is a very flimsy plastic and the main compartment zipper broke entirely within just a few months of use. I am extremely disappointed as the size of this bag was great for all of my gear. Sadly, it seems the manufacturer cut corners in some of the most crucial areas of bag development.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cokos

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to haul two sets of snorkeling equipment (full masks, fins, vests) and 2 beach towels and there's room for plenty more. It's a comfortable backpack too and fits a large man. The outside pocket has plenty of room for sunscreen and personal items, and even has a clip for keys or whatever. The netting is heavy duty. The canvas is sturdy. There is a grommet hole in the bottom to let water out. I'm super pleased and actually surprised at how big it is. I have a feeling we'll use it for more than just a snorkel equipment bag. It's a great boating or beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: MorningGlory

customer_reviews.title: Great Diving Bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack to fit in my scuba gear for a dive trip. I put in my fins, snorkel and mask, dive booties, dive gloves, dive hood and my full body wet suit. I was even able to fit my dive log book (in a water proof pouch of course) and stuck that in the front pocket. It worked very well for me on the trip. It was able to keep all my stuff together in my dive boat cubby and kept my things from flying away while the boat was moving. It didn't have to worry about it getting wet either. From my use of the bag so far, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: This bag is big and burly.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge. Easily fits scuba gear (masks, snorkels, fins & boots) for both my son and I, with room to spare for GoPro stuff, change of clothes, whatever. The mesh seems super durable, the straps are comfortable, and secure, and the sternum strap has an integrated whistle that is good for annoying nearby people, mostly my wife.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: I have an Armor mesh backpack which has been very good for several years
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift to my scuba diving buddy. His mesh backpack completely wore out on a recent dive trip. I have an Armor mesh backpack which has been very good for several years, but this one seems to me even more well made and might be a bit larger. The price is outstanding - it has a lower price than similar bags with well-known scuba brand labels and is just as good or better.
customer_reviews.author: Native Texan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!  Even better price
customer_reviews.text: This is a spacious bag that holds both my scuba fins and snorkel fins. I can put my snorkel in the back zipper area with my mask and not worry that the lens is going to get scratched. The front pouch is perfect for my swim socks and lobster gage. This bag is great. I will update once I really start to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mulan

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything
customer_reviews.text: Really big and fits all my gear. Haven't used it yet for a trip but I was able to fit everything including my fins (27in) which was my biggest fear. Great quality with heavy duty mesh and seems it will last for a long time. Love the back straps (nicely padded) and full length bag zipper for easy access. Outside pocket is a plus. Overall, really excited to use.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My local dive shop charges $80 for basically the same bag. This was an amazing price and it’s very large... plenty of room to hold all of my scuba gear. I don’t have a BCD so I haven’t tried to shove one in there, but there is a good bit of room remaining after my fins, mask, snorkel, towel, and accessories are all thrown in. I love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: aspearson

customer_reviews.title: I like so far
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I haul fins, mask, snorkel, bcd, regulators, wetsuit, booties... all equipment. And it's got shoulder harnesses, like a backpack. Then I put in dry goods, small towel, handkerchief, car keys, watch, in the small outside pocket. I don't haul weights in it though, and the draw string at the top hampers security for air travel. But good for throwing your gear in the back of a truck or car.
customer_reviews.author: Ron T.

customer_reviews.title: If this one breaks I'll gladly buy another.
customer_reviews.text: 27" fins in picture. This bag will fit all my snorkeling gear including a wetsuit with room leftover. The mesh will allow your things to dry. Recommend using wax on the zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great Gear Bag
customer_reviews.text: This a great gear bag for SCUBA or Snorkeling. It held two sets of fins, masks and snorkels easily with room for towels. Be sure to wash it thoroughly after exposure to salt water. I thought we had washed everything well, but still ended up with a little rust on some of the drawstring eyelets.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag at a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scuba bag. I was easily able to put my scuba fins, goggles with case, booties, and snorkel in the bag with plenty of room for other items such as a wetsuit. There is a side pocket for dry items as well. The backpack straps make it easy to carry. Can’t beat the price. Similar bags at my local dice store were double the price or higher.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavesh Rana

customer_reviews.title: Best gear bag I've had
customer_reviews.text: I have had several dive gear bags. This one was the most reasonably priced, has adjustable back pack straps, is holding up very good and is not heavy like my other bags. Very good bag. It's meshed so you can rinse you fins, mask, etc in the bag. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Captain John

customer_reviews.title: The bag is durable, large, efficient and necessary for your scuba needs.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is large enough for all my scuba equipment. It's durable material. It folds down small if you store your gear separately. The mesh is nice to rinse all the equipment quickly after ocean dives. I really enjoy the front pocket. It allows for easy storage of my dive log. I've had it for a year now without issue. I love the backpack straps the equipment can be quite heavy distributing the load across both shoulders saves my back.
customer_reviews.author: John G Stoner

customer_reviews.title: LARGE high quality bag for a Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality PVC (smooth texture) bag. XL and in charge! This bag can fit all of my SCUBA gear, towels, change of clothing and the some more that I can carry on my back! (as long as my weights are not in there!) I will use this as a storage bag and when I go on trips with my friends to keep everything neat and organized! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B4Me

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this bag yet, but it seems really well constructed. Way better than I was expecting for the price. Seems plenty big for everything I plan to carry (BC, Fins, Mask, Reg, etc). I really like the backpack straps, and they seem padded enough to be comfortable. I'll update the review if I have any issues, but I'd absolutely recommend at this point!
customer_reviews.author: MissMeowtastic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family beach trips
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mesh backpack that I could take to the beach and I wanted it to be HUGE so I could fit all my kids toys, towels, and wetsuits. This one is perfect and I can shake out all the sand. Everyone asks me about it at the beach, I feel so clever.
customer_reviews.author: CocoThe Slug

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for gear
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag to hold the entire families masks and other misc stuff for snorkeling while taking a cruise. The bag is very large and very well constructed. I'm very happy with this purchase. It worked exactly as I wanted on our cruise.
customer_reviews.author: PeterInCrosby

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack gear bag
customer_reviews.text: Finally on our trip on western Australia, snorkeling every stop. Bought the bag primarily for this trip, esp for the time on Rottnest island where you bicycle to all coves and beaches. The bag is perfect. Can easily carry 3 plus sets of gear plus. Carriers like a decent backpack w good weight distribution. Also seem very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Let me say first that I haven’t had the opportunity to use the bag yet but I am impressed with the quality of construction for the price. It’s quite roomy and I’m sure will take all my gear including wetsuit. The straps are padded and look comfortable and all the closures are solid. It is a bit heavier than might be ideal, but I’ve torn up other bags with the weight of the gear, so I think that the extra weight will give me better durability and that’s a good trade. I’ll report back after I’ve had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hill

customer_reviews.title: Big Well Constructed Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. It is large and well made. The mesh is not weak, stretchable mesh; It seems to be coated with a rubberized material that helps to make it sturdy. I like that it has a compartment for the fins and i can even squeeze my mask and snorkel into it. I will have no problems getting all of my dive gear in it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonefish SS-582

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2 sets of fins, masks, boots, and more!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!! I spent 2 years looking for a good backpack and this is the answer! I can fit 2 sets of fins, masks, boots, and still room for lots of other stuff! Great handle at the top to grab quickly and easy to clean. Great innovative product - home run!!!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: height was more than 28" and around 17" diameter so the bag is like a seabag. my 18" fins lie on the bottom. now 2 set of fins and a pair of crocks shoes fill the bottom third. if no locker plenty of room for ones clothes. feels sturdy. it's plastic not canvas. with just one pair fins i can squeeze the bag into a rather narrow locker.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Berray

customer_reviews.title: Overall poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Liked it until the plastic snap-in on the shoulder strap broke after around 5 uses and having nothing but normal gear in there. Disappointing but you ultimately get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mike DeAngelo

customer_reviews.title: The backpack straps are extremely comfortable and the full length zipper allowed me to retrieve ...
customer_reviews.text: This diving bag is incredible! I read the customer reviews and was fairly confident with the purchase. I was very pleasantly surprised with the exceptionally high quality of the mesh as well the overall quality of the bag. I was able to fit two sets of fins, masks, snorkels, booties, gloves, and compact towels. There is still plenty of room to add our two shorties. The backpack straps are extremely comfortable and the full length zipper allowed me to retrieve items at the bottom of the bag without having to empty it out. The front pocket is great for personal items.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Rubanov

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling trip!
customer_reviews.text: We've only used it once so far, but it worked great! The bag is very large and fit two sets of snorkel gear (fins, mask, snorkel) with no problem. The little front pocket was great for keys, phone, etc. We loved the backpack straps for keeping our hands free for other things. The bag folded well to fit in our luggage, too! Quality seems good - we'll see how it holds up for future trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mesh Scuba bag
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product- it is mesh for wet equipment and had a dry portion as well. It was bigger than I thought it would be, but as a backpack it is manageable. The order came quickly and was in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Zuki

customer_reviews.title: Great durable and expandable dive gear bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful dive bag. Very well made and sturdy. It expands to hold an incredible amount of stuff. We used it to hold dive and beach gear for two people and we used it to lug our gear in carry on to Maui and all over the island. It held up perfectly. Only minor complaint is that it's on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty bag !!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this bag I was really surprised on how rugged this appears to be and the size. It was bigger than I envisioned it and that was a plus in my book. I can get my gear all in it and extra room. It is comfortable to wear when fully packed. I would not hesitate to recommend this to my dive buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Farmer

customer_reviews.title: SOO MUCH SPACE!
customer_reviews.text: You could smuggle a middle schooler and a toddler, together, in this thing! It has soo much room. I dont see how a full kit wouldnt fit. Or 2 sets of snorkel gear with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Cline

customer_reviews.title: What I love about it is that it's large enough that all ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband because his old bag was falling apart. He loves it, especially the pocket to store his mask. What I love about it is that it's large enough that all my snorkel gear fits in it and he gets stuck carrying it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Martin

customer_reviews.title: Scuba bag for two!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new scuba bag....and yep fits my gear and my hubby's scuba gear all in one bag! Zippers work great in outside pocket which will be great for sunscreen, defogger etc., Hole in the bottom of each compartment will allow this bag to drain well! I also love the full backpack support- shoulder straps, waist and chest straps! Look forward to putting this to the test in a couple of weeks! Fun fact, this company sends note of product shipment and delivery that are completely unique and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tavia F.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it, worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Worked out well, held fins, reg and wetsuit mask etc for one diver. I liked the internal pocket as well as the external one. I packed it in my check in luggage, squished down small, and used it on the day of the dives.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Defective bag - Please fix!!
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived it didn’t have the drawstring attached that is used to close the bag! I cant use this bag because I can not close it and it poses the risk of my gear falling out and becoming damaged. I would really appreciate it if they could send me a new bag with the string or the string to attach it to my current bag
customer_reviews.author: J. Olivo

customer_reviews.title: It's a gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my husband for Christmas. I don't scuba dive, but I think he'll really like it. His old bag ripped the first time he took a trip to Mexico to dive. He saw someone with one similar to this one and mentioned how convenient it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: like it that much
customer_reviews.text: second time we purchased this, like it that much, first one was stolen on our first dive trip after certifying Oh well our bad to not keep our eye on it the whole time sad the world is such a place but such a place it is, the cops were nice though! Highly recommended fits three sets of fins and goggles easily and the back pack makes it easy to carry also
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag. I was able to put all of my diving gear (fins, shoes, mask, snorkle, towel) with additional space left. It will be great for travel since it's fairly light and will fold up easily in a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Athletico Scuba Diving Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It easily held my large fins, mask and snorkel as well as a towel and clothes and shoes with lots of room to spare. It has a large zipper down the side of the bag to open up the bag and has a large pocket on the back side of the bag that runs the length of the bag. The small zipper bag on the outside allows for storage of keys, money, cell phone, etc. I would recommend this bag to others.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal M.

customer_reviews.title: lots of room and durable
customer_reviews.text: Took my snorkeling gear out of the country. It fit my gear and a friends gear with plenty of room. I've only used it for my vacation but I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the old Akona bags we bought in ‘07
customer_reviews.text: We wanted the thicker plastic mesh like the bag we were replacing and Akona had switched to a thinner mesh. We kept that one, but bought this for our heavier gear. So far we love it. Gets near weekly use carrying snorkel gear for 4!
customer_reviews.author: JnKBos

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality material and made with love makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is big. Really big. It holds all my gear with room to spare or seven dozen donuts. There are also two large pockets, one in the front and one right by the shoulder straps. Plenty of room for sunscreen and hair ties for your daughter. Super high quality material and made with love makes it a tough bag. Get one, you'll be happy you did. I'm so happy it's illegal. Seriously....this is one kick-ass bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tlange

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my gear
customer_reviews.text: The diving bag got to the house two days before we left for Hawaii. Now we are in the middle of our 10 day diving trip. Used it everyday and it fits all my gear. Thank you love it. JT
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teenage son to keep his gear. He got his open water cert at Boy Scout summer camp and had his mask snorkel and fins scattered loose in his room. He has big feet and wears XL fins. I was concerned the bag wouldn't be big enough. HA! This bag is HUGE...it could probably fit a BCD or two as well!
customer_reviews.author: plumbersean

customer_reviews.title: Huge scuba bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge. I am able to put 3 sets fins, 3 sets of googles, 3 snorkels and 3 boots for the fins. It still has some room for a bit more. I am giving it a 3 star because the plastic clip on the shoulder strap broke on the first use. I contacted them and they are sending a replacement now. I will give it a better rating if this one holds up. The costumer service of the company is outstanding. I will do business with them agian.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dive Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my certification trip to Maui for my some of my new gear as dive shop bags were too pricey. Used it all week and it was great & comfortable to walk with. Great bag and fits my new large fins perfect! Plenty of room for my other gear i need to buy still 😀
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge!! You can easily fit 2 full wetsuits, 4 booties, 2 masks, 2 storkels, knives, towels, etc.. I love that I can wear it like a backpack. I also love the fact that it folds up super small for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great gear bag
customer_reviews.text: They were delivered quickly and were just what I wanted, as far as size goes. All dive gear fit. Not sure how long the mesh will hold up. Not made out of fabric- more like a foam rubber. Looks as if it could tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great, large bag for all my gear and accessories
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great! Large enough for all my scuba gear including accessories! The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because the outside pocket was advertised to be able to hold my regulator. It is too small for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lorne N. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for snorkel gear. The bag was larger than I had anticipated, BUT....now I am not concerned if I can get all of our gear in one bag. This bag is large enough to hold two sets of snorkel gear. And I like the fact that you can wash the gear right in the bag! There is also a separate outside zipped compartment for the more delicate items like goggles!!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Farina

customer_reviews.title: Perferct size, perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! We don't have our BCDs yet and the two of us shared one bag so I am sure that one bag is plenty for all of one persons dive gear. It has back straps to carry as a backpack, or you can carry like a bag. It has draw string or zipper to load/unload easier. When on the dive boat the bag folds up compactly to stow away so no one is tripping over.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen

customer_reviews.title: A Diver must have!
customer_reviews.text: These bags were perfect for our diving trip to Belize. Both sets of full gear fit into one with room to spare! It traveled well, the straps were helpful and all the pockets made it easy to store all our odds and ends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: I just used once... but amazing, looks very nice. Is very usefull and confortable. Perfect for scuba dive in my case, and fast shipment !
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!  Well made!!
customer_reviews.text: My last dive bag I paid 100 for finally gave out. This one at a third of the price is equally as durable and well made. A lot nicer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty bag
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty bag, but this bag is big, big enough for two sets of gear. I guess it is better to have too much room than not enough. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Large Dive bag
customer_reviews.text: The Dive backpack was as advertised in Amazon. Its large enough to put the fins, BC, wetsuit and regulators with space for the other miscellanous gear. Although the zippers were not YKK, they seem robust.
customer_reviews.author: Wong M.

customer_reviews.title: Great diving bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bag large enough to fit all of your gear and durable to last.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.  Just know it’s fairly large
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t pay close enough attention to the size specifications and missed just how large this bag is. I’m actually not sure it will work for our original purpose, but we still really like the bag. We can actually fit our snorkel, life jackets, and some boating gear in the bag, so it’s taken the place of some smaller containers. The quality seems solid. Overpriced, I feel this bag was a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aaron Britton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag. My second one like it. Wore the first one out after a lot of wear.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Bag. My second one like it. Wore the first one out after a lot of wear. Nice to be able to wear it like a backpack and keep my hands free while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for our gear but the grommets at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for our gear but the grommets at the top started falling apart after the first time using it. Unfortunately it’s too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: JungleMan

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to hold everything and the design and straps are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Guitarman

customer_reviews.title: Great gear bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice beach / pool bag. Seemingly good quality and good durability. Good size and holds a lot of gear!
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, big enough for all of your gear.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for all your gear. Seriously bigger than expected
customer_reviews.author: james moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome diving bag. Tough, fits everything and I love that it can be a backpack or duffel.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than expected, but great quality. I wish the zippered front pocket was waterproof, but otherwise great. High quality Fits two sets of large fins, 3 masks in boxes and 2 towels easily.
customer_reviews.author: BoxesLikeChristmas

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: product is as advertised and arrived on time. Roomy. I like the shoulder straps and various handles for carrying. Zippered pouch on side is good to keep things dry and out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: Alford

customer_reviews.title: Good bag - works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bag holds two sets if everything - lots of room. Built good. Easy to carry on back.
customer_reviews.author: BBaley

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved this. No longer putting wet fins in with ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this. No longer putting wet fins in with other gear. and no seams to melt in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it holds all my gear and it's rugged - my equipment is going to be protected. I don't have a BC, but I could put my skin, shorty, fins, snorkel, mask, dive shoes, towel and dive accessories in the bag and I have room to add.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! It’s really big..can fit all gear including bcd. Most likely will get a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Petfrct size and is well made
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this bag yet but it seems well made and has perfect dimensions. It's smaller at 12 x 12 x 29 then reported on the website. I'm hoping the zippers hold up.
customer_reviews.author: GerrybNH

customer_reviews.title: Bigger and Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't yet taken it on a trip to use it, I can feel the quality and ruggedness of the bag. It's bigger than I expected, which is a positive.
customer_reviews.author: johnb

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable scuba gear bag
customer_reviews.text: perfect bag for carrying my fins and gear. The mesh makes it easy to hose everything down.
customer_reviews.author: SnoopMole

customer_reviews.title: Drying Dive Bag
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Will take awhile t see if it holds up to loading w/heavy dive equipment. Looks great & really nice straps
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Calm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Roomy holds two pairs of snorkels, facemasks, fins, large dive buoy, etc. with room to spare. Comfortable straps for wearing on your back. Love the way the bag cinches up on top. One less zipper to get screwed up. Seems very nicely constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag with tons of space
customer_reviews.text: Currently giving this bag a good field test in the USVI after our old dive bag finally gave up the ghost. So far this bag seems great! Definitely large enough to handle gear for 2 people with room to spare. Seems to be well built (although we haven’t had it very long yet).
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Huge!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE. Like you could fot ab adult person in iy. That's what I get for not reading the details. I was looking for something much smaller. it arrived quickly and seemed to be good quality. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, plenty of room for all the gear ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ,plenty of room for all the gear a dry bag and strong mesh .Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big enough for family of 4 divers fins, snorkles/masks ...
customer_reviews.text: big enough for family of 4 divers fins, snorkles/masks and smaller extra scuba stuff (ie - dive recue kit, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Family gal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge! Well built, beefy zippers, heafty mesh, comfy straps. Only downer is no waterproof compartment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grgich

customer_reviews.title: Great gear bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Tons of room for my scuba fins, boots, weight belt, wetsuit, mask and much more. Very durable and allows for your gear to dry without removing it from the bag. Highly recommend if your looking for something to store scuba or other gear in and comfortable with the shoulder straps.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Spacious (plenty of room)
customer_reviews.text: This diving bag takes all my gear and related stuff with ease. Very satisfied, shoulder straps wide and comfortable. Very worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.author: Love SOLO

customer_reviews.title: This scuba bag is a great value and holds 2 peoples gear with no problem
customer_reviews.text: This scuba bag is a great value and holds 2 peoples gear with no problem. It seems to be constructed very well and fits comfortably on your back with padded shoulder pads.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Ice Man

customer_reviews.title: Greate backpack
customer_reviews.text: Greate bag. Easy to carry and fits everything. Quality seems excellent.
customer_reviews.author: magnus

customer_reviews.title: This bag is super durable and very nice
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super durable and very nice. It holds 24 inch long flippers, the mask, watch, gloves, snorkel, and wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: kdanuelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and load
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great, just the right size for all my dive gear, including wet suits. The bag is light and the shoulder straps are great to carry this as a backpack while also holding cylinders in your hand. Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. While I haven't used it yet it seems well constructed and it is very roomy. Definately all that is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ReedIII

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to hold gear for two
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not used the bag yet, it is exactly as described and fits snorkel gear for two. Has a small front pocket that is pefect for our GoPro case and other small items.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag - still not long enough for my freediving fins
customer_reviews.text: Good bag with lots of storage space, however my fins still stick out a bit... despite checking the measurements before purchasing. Easy grab and go and shoulder straps are very comfortable when carry a heavy load.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and Good Size
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with this product. Has plenty of room for lots of storage space. It comes with a soft bottom, but I knew this when I purchased it. I hand crafted a hard bottom for it, and I like it much better. Maybe Athletico could create one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to the one the dive shop wanted me to buy for $120.00... Haven't put it to hard use yet but so far really happy
customer_reviews.author: ACuriousLady

product_meta.title: Athletico Scuba Diving Bag - XL Mesh Travel Backpack for Scuba Diving and Snorkeling Gear & Equipment - Dry Bag Holds Mask, Fins, Snorkel, and More
feature_bullets: ALL IN ONE HIGH CAPACITY DIVING BAG – XL Heavy Duty 29” x 16” X 16" Mesh Bag Stores All Your Equipment For Scuba Diving Or Snorkeling. Perfect for travel, fits your fins, goggles, mask, wetsuit, regulator, shoes, BCD and more.

BUILT FOR THE RIGORS OF TRAVEL BUT EASY ON THE POCKETBOOK - Our Snorkel Bag is built to last, while keeping the price tag down. Constructed of durable 600D Polyester and PVC Coated mesh, the dive bag is functional, yet durable.

EASY TO CARRY - Adjustable, padded shoulder straps allow the scuba bag to be worn as a backpack. Sternum strap distributes the weight more efficiently, and the attached whistle can be used in case of an emergency.

LIGHTWEIGHT, BREATHABLE DESIGN – Sturdy PVC Coated Mesh Design allows for open air drying, avoiding mold or mildew on your dive equipment. Rinse your gear right in the bag, and allow to air dry. Ideal for all water sports - Scuba, Snorkeling, Swim, Diving, Surfing and more. Perfect for travel by plane or car.
BACKED BY THE ATHLETICO 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If your are not satisfied with your new Athletico Scuba Bag for any reason, simply return it for a full refund, no questions asked!
